attributes.review: first of all you have to receive text messages when you first get the app which is super dumb because should the app be able to send you notifications, secondly the things that donald trump some of the things says are ridiculous and inaccurate, third if you downloaded this app to support him you’re part of the problem :)
attributes.title: this is the worst app ever

attributes.review: i got this app and all of a sudden my left middle toe detached itself from my body and ran away 😡. he was so disgusted by this app that he couldn’t stand being apart of my anatomy. before he left he yelled, “𝓼𝓱𝓪𝔀𝓽𝔂𝓼 🧎‍♀️𝓵𝓲𝓴𝓮 𝓪 𝓶𝓮𝓵𝓸𝓭𝔂 🎼 𝓲𝓷 𝓶𝔂 𝓱𝓮𝓪𝓭 👨‍🦰𝓽𝓱𝓪𝓽 𝓲 𝓬𝓪𝓷𝓽 𝓴𝓮𝓮𝓹 𝓸𝓾𝓽 ❌ 𝓰𝓸𝓽 𝓶𝓮 𝓼𝓲𝓷𝓰𝓲𝓷𝓰 👩‍🎤𝓵𝓲𝓴𝓮, 𝓷𝓪 𝓷𝓪 🤪𝓮𝓿𝓮𝓻𝔂𝓭𝓪𝔂 𝓵𝓲𝓴𝓮 𝓶𝔂 𝓲𝓹𝓸𝓭 🔋𝓲𝓽𝓼 𝓼𝓽𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓸𝓷 🥰𝓻𝓮𝓹𝓵𝓪𝔂“ and i cried for 4 and a half years straight, so i hope you’re happy 😤.
attributes.title: my left toe doesn’t agree😹😹

attributes.review: TERRIBLE, crashes. and honestly I think that the Chinese government will hack into it and gain all our information. I think this app should be banned in the US, for our safety as Americans.
attributes.title: CRASHES. should be removed for US Safety

attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing I see is Ivanka’s Gorrilla Grip Côöçhīė 3000 and frankly I’m a little disturbed. Not only that, it immediately gave my phone a virus, so now I can’t open any app without first seeing a 90 sec ad for Trump’s Campaign.
attributes.title: What in the world....

attributes.review:
i went to open the app and the first thing that appears was this cheeto puff looking thing and i screamed i was so scared i thought this was supposed to be a normal app they should have warnings, that image now hunts me forever😔😭
i had a dream last night that cheetoman came to get me and he was holding a spray tan on his hand, he wanted to spray me and make me orange like him 😔🤢 be careful out there guys cheetoman is always looking for u 😖😥
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: This app is the most horrifying thing I have ever seen. I cannot put into words the amount of trauma I received from the opening photo. I am appalled. This should not be legal this app needs to be gone
attributes.title: Nasty

attributes.review: Immediately after I downloaded this app, a Raven Simone vision came to me. I saw Helen Keller trying to attack me. I felt sick to my stomach and immediately deleted the app. She comes to me when I sleep. #imtraumatized
attributes.title: I can no longer sleep

attributes.review: i was mortified when i first opened the app 😔 the first thing that popped up on my screen was a giant cheeto... i’m allergic to cheetos. it somehow gave me an allergic reaction through my phone causing me to suffocate and DIE. i will be suing the app and the cheeto puff for killing me 😔🙈💕💫
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: When I got the app I only got it to see the plans for Donald’s trumps funeral because you know he is dead but to only see fake news and I was disappointed
attributes.title: no just no

attributes.review: nobody likes cheeto puffs they are bad. just like him. i hope this app gets deleted 🥰 DELETE THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE NOW. when i got it everything deleted off my phone and all that shows is a picture of an orange. gross
attributes.title: so bad 0 stars
